name: BarryBolin
description:
Barry Bolin, bowling ball wants nothing more than SPEED. This is a strange platformed where the goal of the game is to reach uncontrollable speeds!

Instructions:
Jump with Space Bar

Shoot in the Air with the clicky button after getting an upgrade. 

if you touch the left side of the screen you die, you lose. You have 3 lives. 

Thank you
